wikipedia_page.main: Tecwyn Jones (3 January 1930 – 29 December 2008) was a Welsh professional footballer who played in the Football League for Brentford and Wrexham as a full back. He also played non-League football for Chelmsford City and Dartford.

response: Tecwyn Lloyd Jones (born 27 January 1941 in Ruabon, Wales) is a former Welsh professional footballer who played for football league clubs Wrexham, Colchester United and Crewe Alexandra before moving into Welsh non-league football.Player Profile - Tecwyn Jones  He represented Wales at U23 level.
